channel.title: How to fix the "x" on shop
channel.description:
how i can fix it please help me :confused:
[edite] or just the buy 10 and give 50

item.title: How to fix the "x" on shop
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Good point. My apologies shamu308, replace the old conditions, or change the 50 to a 40.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the "x" on shop

item.title: How to fix the "x" on shop
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:340602”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=436970.msg3211036#msg3211036 date=1274234708]
Sallad your extremelley rude.
[/quote]

Not to worry, hes already been banned.

@OP

Add this to case 129 in client.java

} else if (interfaceID == 3823) { // Sell 50 sellItem(removeID, removeSlot, 50); } else if (interfaceID == 3900) { // Buy 50 buyItem(removeID, removeSlot, 50); }
Buy 10 now buys 50.[/quote]
Don’t you mean replace? It’ll be buying 60 each time.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the "x" on shop
